data.title: Adolphe Édouard Casimir Joseph Mortier
data.meta_description: A short biography (with portrait) of Charles Pierre François Augereau (1757-1816), Duke of Treviso, Marshal of the First French Empire.
data.text:
N & E

Napoleon & Empire

Adolphe Édouard Casimir Joseph Mortier

First Duke of Treviso

Pronunciation:

Born on February 13th, 1768 in Le Cateau-Cambrésis, North of France.

Dead on July 28th, 1835 in Paris.

Marshal of the First French Empire.

"Marshal Mortier, Duke of Treviso". 19th century French school.

Website created on March 9, 2008 by Lionel A. Bouchon and Didier Grau.
